subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: After 11 seasons with the Cardinals, Albert Pujols signed a $240 million contract with the Angels, but until recently, he was not close to being the player he was in St. Louis.
snippet: After 11 seasons with the Cardinals, Albert Pujols signed a $240 million contract with the Angels, but until recently, he was not close to being the player he was in St. Louis.
